snippet.title: Rise of the Dragon (Sega CD) Playthrough - NintendoComplete (SD)
snippet.description:
A beginning to end playthrough of Dynamix's 1994 Sega CD game, Rise of the Dragon.

Please see my new playthrough updated for HD with much better video quality here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qld3p8udDjY

An amazing adaptation of a good PC point-and-click graphic adventure game, made much better by the atmosphere created with the CD audio and spoken dialogue, which more than compensates for the heavy color-loss that the graphics suffered in the port from the VGA version. 


____________________________________
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
http://www.facebook.com/pages/NintendoComplete/540091756006560
https://twitter.com/nes_complete
